column5: TOKYO  April 13 Japan's Nikkei share average ended flat on Monday in choppy trading  with some investors pocketing gains in major stocks such as Toyota Motor Corp  after the index touched the key 20 000 level last week.     The Nikkei ended flat at 19 905.46 after shifting in and out of positive territory  while the broader Topix  underperformed  falling 0.2 percent to 1 586.26.
